Bonus: If the target is disabled, deal additional piercing damage.
Each target hit becomes Vulnerable. If hit again, Vulnerable is removed and bonus damage is dealt.
Fear, Madness, and Sleep are purged from encouraged allies.
Your deep knowledge of sacred texts allow you to use Bless to deal damage to Undead.
Apply Sundered, reducing max physical/magic armor by 25%.
A localized quake is created where your weapon contacts the ground, dealing damage to enemies in a 3m radius.
When Crippled wears off, the target has a chance to trip for 1 turn.
If the target is marked, this skill deals a critical hit.
If the target is Knocked Down, deal a critical hit.
Each hit reduces the target's maximum physical/magic armor by 25% for 1 turn.
The knife thrown has a 25% chance to be coated in poison or explosive oil, dealing bonus damage on hit.
Damage taken while rushing is reduced by 75%.
Gain hyper-focus, increasing the damage of the next shot of your pistol by 50%.
Gain follow-up combo skills after punching a target. 25% chance to increase Sucker Punch's Knockdown by 1 turn.
Consumes bleeding on targets hit to deal a burst of piercing damage. Damage increases for each turn of Bleeding.
Damage from the next hit taken is reduced by 25%.
Taunted enemies gain a 25% movement speed debuff.
Targets hit have their resistance to your staff's element reduced by 25%.
At the end of the stomp, a magical vortex with your staff's element explodes, dealing additional damage in a 3m range.
If standing in a pool of blood before Flesh Sacrifice is cast, absorb it to restore health and negate the Constitution debuff.
